title: Ep. 16: 'The Watch'
description:
Andy and Chris discuss Rihanna's long-awaited 'ANTI' (6:00), Kanye's Twitter beef (14:00), Drake vs. Meek (21:00), and 'The People v. O.J. Simpson: American Crime Story' (31:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
